configs.author: TeslaCoil Apps
configs.name: Nova Launcher (Beta)
configs.additionalSettings: {"about":"The premier custom launcher for Android, providing you with powerful features that you will soon realize you can't live without.","appName":"Nova Launcher (Beta)","customLinkFilterRegex":"^(?:[0-9]+\\.){2}[0-9]+(?:\\s+BETA)?$","filterByLinkText":true,"matchGroupToUse":"$1$6.$2$7.$3$4$5$8","reverseSort":false,"skipSort":false,"sortByLastLinkSegment":true,"trackOnly":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"versionDetection":true,"versionExtractWholePage":false,"versionExtractionRegEx":"^https\\:\\/\\/(?:(?:teslacoilapps\\.com\\/tesladirect\\/download\\.pl\\?(?:[^#&]*&)*packageName\\=com\\.teslacoilsw\\.launcher&(?:[^#&]*&)*betaType\\=public&(?:[^#&]*&)*versionCode\\=([0-9]+)([0-9])(?:(?:0{2}([0-9]))|(?:0([1-9][0-9]))|([1-9][0-9]{2}))(?:[&#].*)?)|(?:novalauncher\\.com\\/apk\\/NovaLauncher_([0-9]+)\\.([0-9]+)\\.([0-9]+)\\.apk))$"}

description.en: The premier custom launcher for Android, providing you with powerful features that you will soon realize you can't live without.
